tech_news.title: God of War Trilogy Remake Will Feature New Combat System, Says Christopher Judge; Cory Barlog’s Game to Be Revealed in Late Summer - Wccftech
tech_news.description: Christopher Judge revealed that the God of War Trilogy remake will feature a new combat system. He also teased Cory Barlog's game for Summer.

tech_news.title: What’s the deal with that sculpture at Porter? - The Boston Globe
tech_news.description: It catches your eye if you’re shopping at the nearby Target. From up Mass. Ave., it looks like a futuristic beacon. You can see rust all the way up, before you take the escalators all the way down.
